section.para: To view and edit unposted Cash Receipts, select the "Cash Receipt Edit List" option. The following screen will appear:
The Cash Receipt Edit List displays information on all unposted Cash Receipts, including Customer name, distribution date, and distribution amount.

note.para: The Cash Receipt Edit List may include Cash Receipts generated as a result of post-authorized Credit Card charges.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Cash Receipt.

Enables you to edit highlighted Cash Receipt. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Cash Receipt—except that when editing, the fields will contain pre-loaded Cash Receipt information. Double-clicking on a Cash Receipt will also bring you to the editing screen.

note.para: When editing a Cash Receipt, you may notice the "Credit Card" tab is not visible. This is an intentional design to prevent users from altering Credit Card transactions which have already been processed.

listitem.para: Highlight a Cash Receipt and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Cash Receipt and then select this button to remove the Cash Receipt from the edit list.
